name: Pressured (itch)
description:
"Pressured"; a single player minigame based on the depiction of stress. The purpose of this game is to do as many tasks as possible without spreading yourself too thin. 

A room with a new task lights up green and you'll know once you've finished your task.

[Controls]

Movement (Up and Down Arrow/W&S)
Rotation (Left and Right Arrow/A&D)
Camera (Mouse)

Music: Voice of an Angel by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com) Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License
